item.description:
Surfrider is looking for 5-8 more volunteers for the Naukabout
Music Festival on Sat, Aug 6th in East Falmouth (Cape Cod).

Come out and spend an awesome summer day listening to Ryan
Mountbleau Band, Zach Deputy, Barefoot Truth, Adam Ezra Group
and many more ( www.naukabout.com).

Free tickets for any Surfrider volunteers that sign up by the end of next week. We need volunteers to take turns sitting at an informational table
(we'll brief you on what you need to know!) and informing
concert goers about the recycling efforts that we are
sponsoring at the event (recycling plastic water bottles).
Possible carpools can be arranged for those coming from the
boston area.

Contact Tuck Welch ( tuckwelch@yahoo.com) at Surfrider if you
would like to volunteer
item.name: Naukabout Music Festival Surfrider Volunteers needed
